column1: * Spoken form, usually not written; in writing, the unappended plural form (optionally followed by the full pronoun) is preferred.
fella af (to cast off)  fella hugi saman (to fall in love)  fella niður lykkju (to drop a stitch)  fella niður mál (to dimiss a matter)
column3: fella niður (to cancel)  fella niður (to delete)  fella sig ekki við (to rather dislike something)  fella tár
column5: fella úr (to drop something, to cut something)  felldur  vera ekki við eina fjölina felldur
